reference.title: subjectCell
reference.shortdesc: Specifies subjects for a constrained classification of content topics.

section.title: Description
section.p: This cell can be empty in the element but must identify the classified topics within the element.

Within the element, the subjectCell element specifies a constraint on the classifying subjects in the column. For a facet classification, the subjectCell element specifies the top subject for a facet category.

Within the element, the subjectCell element specifies the subjects that classify the content topics in the element within the same row. If a header row specifies a constraint for the column, the subjects in the cell must conform to that constraint. For a facet classification, the subjects must appear within the hierarchy for the facet category in a scheme.
Use the element if the subject is the primary subject for the content topics. Otherwise, use the element.
section.note: Each content subject can only have one primary subject.
